Functions
fza_fnc_calculateAlphaAndBeta
Description

Calculates and returns _alpha (angle of attack) and _beta (sideslip) for the helicopter.

Reference

https://​www​.mathworks​.com​/help​/aeroblks​/incidencesideslipairspeed​.html https://​trace​.tennessee​.edu​/cgi​/viewcontent​.cgi​?referer=​&httpsredir=1​&article=5851​&context=utk_gradthes

Parameters
_heli

The apache helicopter to check.

Returns

_alpha (angle of attack) in degrees _beta (sideslip) in degrees
